author: wrowe
msg: Some extra slash correctness for Win32/OS2 (Netware likely needs a patch.)
All slashes should be corrected if APR_FILEPATH_TRUENAME is given,
otherwise the caller's string (choice of slashes) should be returned.

author: wrowe
msg: Cleanup and speedup the UNC path through wchar->utf-8 filename translation

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Suppress use of mkstemp(), our own gettemp() is better.

msg: Allowed NetWare to take advantage of the system timezone variable
